title: Mad Max II
creator_credit: George Miller, Byron Kennedy and Kennedy Miller Productions
brief_description: Mad Max helps a small community defend itself against gangs desperate for fuel. Set in a post WW3 world where gasoline is the only hard currency. Stars Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Mike Preston, Max Phipps, Vernon Wells. Cinematography by Dean Semler, Music by Brian May. Written by Terry Hayes and George Miller.
